column2: "Efraim asabokwafo ahopɔw abɔtsir ndue
column3: na n'ahoɔfɛw enyimnyam nhyiren a ɔromonsom no a ɔwɔ hɔn a nsa ato hɔn ntentan wɔ hɔn angoa bɔnsa no etsifi no!"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: EWURADZE wɔ ahoɔdzenfo na ɔkatakyi bi; ɔtse dɛ ɔsorbo a orugu
column5: na obodwiriw egu famu ahoɔdzen do dɛ nsutɔr dzendzen
column6: dɛ esu a oeyir apram do."

column2: "Efraim asabokwafo ahopɔw abɔtsir no wobetsiatsia do wɔ ananadze:"
"na n'ahoɔfɛw enyimnyam nhyiren a amonsom a ɔwɔ angoa bɔnsa no etsifi no
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dɛ adɔmba a odzi kan ber ansaana ɔpɛber edur a obiara a ohu no
column4: odzi ne nsa ka ara a

column2: "Da no mu na dɔm EWURADZE bɛyɛ enyimnyam abɔtsir na ahoɔfɛw ahenkyɛw ama ne man nkaa no:"
"ɔnye atsɛmbu sunsum ama onyia no a ɔatsena rubu atsɛn no
column3: na ahoɔdzen ama hɔn a wopia ɔko fi kuropon ano san no."

column2: "Na woyinom so wɔnam nsa do ato ntentan
column3: wɔnam nsadzen do wɔatɔ dɔnsuar; ɔsɔfo na nkɔnhyɛnyi nam nsadzen do ato ntentan

column2: "Na fe nye fi ayeyɛ edzidzipon nyina do ma
column3: ma bea biara do nntsew."

column2: "Woana na ɔbɛkyerɛ no nyimdzee? Na woana na ɔbɛma ɔatse amandzɛɛ no ase? Hɔn a woetwa hɔn enumfo
column3: na wɔatsew hɔn efi numfo ano no anaa?"

column2: "Na ahyɛdze tsia ahyɛdze
column3: ahyɛdze tsia ahyɛdze; mbra tsia mbra

column2: "Dabida
column3: mbom apɔtɔfo kasaa nye ananaben gyirama na EWURADZE dze bɛkasa akyerɛ ɔman yi."

column2: "Hɔn a ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ahomgye nye yi
column4: hom mma nyia ɔaberɛ ahomgye; na ahotɔ nye yi: naaso wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE asɛm bɛyɛ hɔn dɛ; ahyɛdze a otsia ahyɛdze
column3: ahyɛdze tsia ahyɛdze; mbra a otsia mbra
column4: mbra a otsia mbra; ha kakra
column5: hɔ kakra; ma wɔaakɔ na woeekotutu ahwe hɔn ekyir

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntsie EWURADZE asɛm
column3: hom atwetwesifo a hom dzi ɔman yi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm do mpanyin:"

column2: "osiandɛ hom aka dɛ
column3: Yɛnye owu edzi ahyɛmu
column4: na yɛnye samanadze edzi nhyehyɛɛ; sɛ mbusu a ɔpram do no rutwa mu a
column6: ɔrennka hɛn; osiandɛ yɛdze atorsɛm ayɛ hɛn guandɔbew
column7: na akɔhwisɛm ase na yehuntsa hɛnho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column4: medze ɔbo bi roto fapem wɔ Zion
column6: kutuwdo bo a ɔsom bo a wɔato no fapem pintsinn: Nyia ɔgye dzi no

column2: "Na medze atsɛmbu no bɛyɛ susuhoma
column3: medze tsenenee ayɛ susudua promo; na ɔsorbo no bɛpra ator guandɔbew no nyina akɔ
column4: na esu no apram huntsabea no do."

column2: "Na hom nye owu ntamu ahyɛmu no wɔbɛtsetsew mu
column3: na hom nye samanadze nhyehyɛɛ no rinngyina; sɛ mbusu a ɔpram do no rutwa mu a

column2: "Mpɛn dodow a orutwa mu no
column3: ɔbɛfa hom: na anapa anapa na obotwa mu
column4: adzekyee na adzesaa: na no ho amandzɛɛbɔ no asetse bɛyɛ hu ara nko."

column2: "Na mpa no yɛ tsia dɛ obi bɛtsen no ho ato do; na akatado tam no ɔyɛ heahea dɛ obi dze bobua no do."
"Na EWURADZE bɔsoɛr dɛ bepɔw Perazim do dze no
column3: no bo bofuw dɛ Gibeon bɔnsa mu dze no: ama ɔaayɛ n'edwuma

column2: "Afei dɛm ntsi mma hom nnyɛ atwetwesifo
column3: ma hom nkyehoma aannyɛ dzen; osiandɛ ɔsɛɛ pasapasa a woesua ato hɔ na matse wɔ EWURADZE

column2: "Hom nyɛ aso na hom ntsie me ndze
column3: hom nkyɛn aso na hom ntsie me kasaa."

column2: "Ana daa nyina na ofuntumfo funtum dɛ orudua? Ana daa nyina na otutu n'asaase enyi
column3: bobɔ no do nkotowa?"

column2: "Sɛ ɔyɛ enyi dɛfɛɛ a
column3: ana ondua nhabamba dɛ eme na akatsewa? Ana onndua ewifua akyerɛpɛn akyerɛpɛn
column4: ɔnye atoko wɔ mbrɛ wɔahyɛ ama no no

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔakyerɛ no n'enyiwado
column3: ne Nyankopɔn na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ no."

column2: "Wɔmmfa porowdze ndam ndam mmporow eme
column3: eso wɔmmfa tseaseanam anan nntsiatsia fan do; na wɔdze aborbaa bor eme

column2: "Ana wɔsan dwow paanoo bio a? Oho
column3: wɔnnkɔ do ara mmporow no daapem: na kaansa ɔdze ne ntseaseanam anan na no mpɔnkɔ fa do mpo a

column2: "Iyi so fi dɔm EWURADZE hɔ ba; ɔyɛ apam mu ɔnwanwanyi
column3: na nyansa mu abɔso no."
